Class AlienAddon

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.ComponentTiles.ComponentTile
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.ComponentTiles.AlienAddon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AlienAddon extends ComponentTile
AlienAddon represents a specific type of component tile that includes additional functionality for alien presence and specific coloring. It extends the ComponentTile class. This class visually represents alien add-ons with specific styles based on predefined sides and color attributes.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AlienAddon

      public AlienAddon(String pngName, Side topSide, Side bottomSide, Side leftSide, Side rightSide, String color)
      Constructs an AlienAddon object, which is a specific type of component tile representing an alien-themed add-on with configurable sides and a color attribute. This class extends ComponentTile and provides additional functionality related to alien-specific properties.
      Parameters:
      pngName - the name of the PNG file representing the visual appearance of the tile.
      topSide - the configuration of the top side of the tile, represented as a Side.
      bottomSide - the configuration of the bottom side of the tile, represented as a Side.
      leftSide - the configuration of the left side of the tile, represented as a Side.
      rightSide - the configuration of the right side of the tile, represented as a Side.
      color - a String representing the color attribute of the alien add-on.

  • Method Details

    • getAddonColor

      public String getAddonColor()
      Retrieves the color associated with the alien add-on.
      Overrides:
      getAddonColor in class ComponentTile
      Returns:
      a string representing the color of the alien add-on.

    • isAlienAddon

      public boolean isAlienAddon()
      Determines whether the current component tile is categorized as an alien addon.
      Overrides:
      isAlienAddon in class ComponentTile
      Returns:
      true if this component tile is an alien addon, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the AlienAddon object. The string includes the class name, the color of the addon, and the descriptions of all four sides (top, bottom, left, right).
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representing the AlienAddon, including its color and side configurations.

    • getDrawable

      public DrawableComponentTile getDrawable()
      Retrieves a drawable representation of the current component tile.
      Specified by:
      getDrawable in class ComponentTile
      Returns:
      An instance of DrawableAlienAddon, which is a specific drawable representation for the alien-related add-on component tile.

    • getDrawableTUI

      public DrawableComponentTileTUI getDrawableTUI()
      Retrieves the textual user interface (TUI) drawable associated with the AlienAddon component tile. This method returns a new instance of a DrawableAlienAddonTUI, which provides a textual representation of the current AlienAddon instance, including its sides and color properties.
      Overrides:
      getDrawableTUI in class ComponentTile
      Returns:
      a DrawableComponentTileTUI object that visually represents the AlienAddon component in a text-based interface.
